text: We demonstrated in earlier studies that the upstream region of the mouse <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter at positions between -95 and -73 is essential for transcriptional activation in response to PMA / A23187 .

text: This region contains two DNA - binding motifs , GM2 and GC-box .

The GM2 sequence ( GGTAGTTCCC ) is recognized by an inducible factor NF-GM2 ; the other ( CCGCCC ) by constitutive factors A1 , A2 , and B . To elucidate the mechanism of <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene activation , we have purified the inducible factor NF-GM2 from the nuclear extract of stimulated Jurkat cells on the basis of specific DNA - binding activity .

The purified NF-GM2 consists of 50 ( <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) and 65 kDa ( <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) polypeptides and has a binding activity specific for both the <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and immunoglobulin kappa ( GGAAAGTCCC ) enhancers .

Electrophoretically purified <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> alone can form a protein - DNA complex , but in the mixture , <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> associates preferentially with <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> to form the NF-GM2 complex .

text: In addition , <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gave per se , with low affinity , a protein - DNA complex that migrated more slowly than native NF-GM2 complex .

Furthermore , an antiserum against <extra_id_0> KBF1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( identical to 50 kDa NF-kappa B protein ) reacted with the <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> of NF-GM2 , indicating that the NF-GM2 polypeptide can not be immunologically differentiated from the 50 kDa subunit of NF-kappa B .

The purified NF-GM2 activated in vitro transcription from the kappa B enhancer , while it failed to stimulate transcription from the <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter harboring the GM2 sequence .
